GSD.description:
coresight: etm4x: avoid build failure with unrolled loops

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit c209db797d6409e3b315cecc400c09d2696227eb. For more details please see the references link.
